title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2790/95 of 1 December 1995 providing for the partial release of minimum stocks in the sugar sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2790/95 of 1  December 1995 providing for the partial release of minimum stocks in the sugar sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The percentages referred to in points (a) and (b) of Article 1 of  Regulation (EEC) No 1789/81 are hereby reduced to 3  % during the period from 1 December 1995 to 30  November 1996.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 December 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
